cede.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: to give something such as an area of land or a right to a country or person, especially when you are forced to
cede.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Hong Kong was ceded to Britain in 1842.
cede.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to officially give property, land, or rights to someone else
cede.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: He has been forced to cede control of the company.
The airline plans to cede majority ownership to creditors.
